page.title: 02CLUBS BEULAH - GARTH
page.content: Young Farmers Club,Beulah,20 members aged 12-26,meets fortnightly in winter compete in rallies, shows and drama comp. Lectures by vets, local farmers, police. Beulah Elderly Club meets monthly in summer for speakers, outings and also a Christmas party. Llangammarch and Garth combine in Nat.O.A.P.Assn.3 out -ings a year and Christmas dinner.Wed. Social Club covers same area, meets all year,either in Church Hall Llan- gammarch or members homes. Womens Institute, Garth, 30 members mostly farmers wives, meets monthly. Mothers Union - church organisation, members of all denominations. Garth and Llangammarch, meets alternately in each place, Beulah meets in Reading Room, speakers,films, outings. -
